name: PAPER ANGEL
description:
PAPER ANGEL

PAPER ANGEL is a short visual novel made in RPG Maker VX Ace. You have become conscious and find yourself taking care of “Spinwhim”. Why? Who know! It is just great that you are here :-) ! 

I made this for Winter Visual Novel Jam 2022. It takes place during the ending of a snowstorm, it is embedded with feelings of winter. This is my first game and first story I finished. I hope you enjoy it.

Content Warning: Eyestrain, Clusters, Reality Distortion… 

DIRECTIONS:

Download Game. Unzip the Zipped File. Go in there. Run “Game.EXE”!

THE CONTROLS: 

Arrow Keys for Navigating Menus

Z - Proceed

X - Cancel?

F5 toggles Fullscreen / F6 toggles Window Size 

There is no saving or continuing, the dialogue boxes won’t let you…

SCRIPTS USED:

Ace Message System v1.05 by Yanfly

Fullscreen++ v2.2 by Zeus81
